description: Translate text across supported language pairs, including Estonian, English, and Russian. Discover available languages and pairs on demand. Streamline multilingual workflows with straightforward translation.

capabilities.name: translate_text
capabilities.description:
Translate text between supported language pairs using TartuNLP.
        
        Args:
            text: Text to translate
            source_lang: Source language code (e.g., 'et', 'en', 'ru')
            target_lang: Target language code (e.g., 'et', 'en', 'ru')
            model: Optional model/domain specification
